Comment and analysis on the big stories of the day in Ireland and abroad with a panel of guests covering the key issues.
Ormerod is confronted with a family tragedy when a domestic dispute spirals out of control. Lizzie's scooter causes more trouble than it is worth.
A rotating panel comprised of women from the entertainment and journalism worlds discuss issues from a female perspective, from politics and current affairs to all the latest gossip.
Brian McFadden presents the dining challenge show. DJ Mike Read puts on a dinner party at his Oxfordshire home for four dinner guests as he plays mystery celebrity host.
Spicy crab cake rolls with thousand island dressing, cheese and sweet potato slices, donuts with both sweet and savoury fillings, homemade ginger beer and tropical lollies.
Goodwin puts his career on the line to fight for justice when a young boy is injured in a factory accident.
Alun aims for the big time but discovers the true cost of fame, and Dr Weatherill's visit to a reclusive patient unlocks deep-seated wartime memories.
Some of the top celebrities across Ireland are interviewed while the hosts feature knowledgeable advice on topics that cover multiple topics and industries.
A Westport couple seek Liz's help in getting them out of living above a pub, and a Dublin couple seek a country escape. Kevin and PJ take a shocking tour of vacant homes in Cork.
A look back at all the main stories and headlines of 2012, all set to the music of the time.
A series which chronicles the news and events of the past 20 years, all set to music. The year 2013 is brought into focus.
Irish football legend Paul McGrath sits down with Tommy Martin for an in-dept interview on his journey through football, from Sallynoggin to Manchester United to the World Cup. He opens up abo
Paul McGrath played at three major tournaments throughout Irelands golden era. He relives a club and international career and his battles on and off the field.
Ainsley makes fried mackerel, tomato and pomegranate salad; Ben Ebbrell makes summer courgette chilaquiles; Cyrus Todiwala makes spicy chicken thighs and vegetables.
A Cardiff beautician hopes to be swept off her feet by three suitors' fashion senses, including a law graduate, a judo champion, and a student.
Bradley Walsh hosts as the Beast, the Governess, the Sinnerman, the Vixen and the Dark Destroyer - aka the Chasers - form the world's greatest quiz team. Can anyone beat them?
Bill Turnbull hosts a quiz show featuring a regular cast of contributors known as the Think Tank who answer hundreds of questions before the show.
Judge Judy presides over her courtroom with wit and wisdom.
Judge Judy presides over her courtroom with wit and wisdom.
A mix of celebrity interviews, entertainment news, current affairs discussions, a look at sports competitions, health columns, cooking tips and tricks, and more.

John Torode and Lisa Faulkner share more crowd-pleasing recipes, including prawn satay served with smashed cucumber, pot roast chicken, Thai curry and a lychee granita.
The first final of the cooking competition which sees professional chefs working with home cooks. The four teams go head-to-head, with Pierre Koffmann judging the dishes.
Bill Turnbull hosts a quiz show featuring a regular cast of contributors known as the Think Tank who answer hundreds of questions before the show.
The unfiltered realities Irish people face in the search for a home, taking a look at the emotional rollercoaster, challenges and hard-won joys of buying a property.
The unfiltered realities Irish people face in the search for a home, taking a look at the emotional rollercoaster, challenges and hard-won joys of buying a property.
Eamonn Holmes and Ruth Langsford host the fun daily quiz. Three engaged couples have the chance to win their wedding gift list - and a dream holiday.
Retired rugby union player Alan Quinlan speaks about his nine-year career in Ireland, during which he won 27 caps and appeared in three World Cups.
It looks as though the casualty department may have to close. Dr Weatherill risks everything to save a homeless man trapped at a building site.
Last ever episode. Aisling's adoption is official but Brigid is confused by her feelings. Dr Ormerod opens a can of worms when he attends to a rough local family.
A Labrador has his first day as a drug sniffer, the managers see if they can smuggle a fake bomb past their screening teams and Annie faces her moment of truth.
Former Republic of Ireland discusses his time as a manager, taking the Ireland job twice, the 2002 World Cup and his relationship with Roy Keane.
Some the most classic and most memorable matches from Europe's premier club competition.
Some of the many highlights from Cristiano Ronaldo's Champions League career.
The five-time Paralympian tells us about her life as an elite swimmer and her journey to gold in Rio 2016.
Extreme angler Jeremy Wade ventures deep into Central America in search of a giant fish which is said to leap into boats and cause fatal injuries.
The case that gripped Australians and many people around the world.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.show_description: Follow the lavish lives of six savvy champagne-swilling Beverly Hills women who were born for shopping and partying! Hearts are racing after Crystal's medical emergency.
A new group of charter guests arrive with high spirits and even higher expectations. As Sandy joins the guests for dinner, Mathew puts extra pressure on himself to impress.
